body:
Quick note: sounds reasonable. In the meantime I think you can use something like

    cborMapper.tokenStreamFactory().isEnabled(CBORReadFeature.XXX)

NOTE: being API extension, needs to go in 3.1(.0)

rename.from: Provide isEnabled methods for CBORReadFeature and CBORWriteFeature
rename.to: Provide `isEnabled()` methods for format-specific features (like `CBORReadFeature` and `CBORWriteFeature`) in mappers

rename.from: Provide `isEnabled()` methods for format-specific features (like `CBORReadFeature` and `CBORWriteFeature`) in mappers
rename.to: Add `isEnabled()` methods for format-specific features (like `CBORReadFeature` and `CBORWriteFeature`) to mappers

body: Oh. Adding implementation, I realized that what I suggested is not quite the same as proper `isEnabled()` implementation -- latter will also consider overrides Mapper may have/apply.
